name: @teipublisher/pb-extension-template
description: A demo component to be used as template for extending pb-components

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docs && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run docs && rollup -c rollup.config.js --environment BUILD:production
scripts.clean: rimraf dist i18n/common images css lib custom-elements.json
scripts.prepare: npm run docs && npm run build:production

author: Wolfgang Meier
